item.title: Xteleto error - Delta
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Hint hint…

Look at your try/catch statement, then mine.

try { Thread.Sleep(TICK_TIME); } catch (Exception e) { e.printStackTrace(); }

Look at the bracket differences between the try/catch statements.

sigh, fixed…


if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 1)) {
        try {
                String otherPName = command.substring(8);
                int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);
        if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                toX = p.absX;
                toY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                sM("Teleport: You have teleported to" +playerName+ ".");
        }
                } catch (Exception e) {
                sM("Try entering the player you want to teleport to.");
}

Read full topic

item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

`SJ_:

Extreme, we don’t condone spoonfeeding in this community.

Alright, I won’t from now on,

Anyway OP;

Your command condition is ending before it reaches the ‘catch’ statement, too many bracket’s.

item.title: Xteleto error - Delta
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

Here is my Xteleto code:

if (command.startsWith("xteleto") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { String otherPName = command.substring(8); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if (otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; toX = p.absX; toY = p.absY; heightLevel = p.heightLevel; updateRequired = true; sM("Teleport: You have teleported to" +playerName+ "."); } } } catch (Exception e) { sM("Try entering the player you want to teleport to."); }

Here is my error:

client.java:9656: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try { ^ client.java:9665: 'else' without 'if' } else { ^ client.java:9667: 'catch' without 'try' } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9667: ')' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9667: not a statement } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9667: ';' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9672: 'try' without 'catch' or 'finally' try { ^ client.java:9684: 'catch' without 'try' } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9684: ')' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9684: not a statement } catch (Exception e) { ^ client.java:9684: ';' expected } catch (Exception e) { ^ 11 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
